title: [Admission] MCA admission Interview questions?
content:
What kind of questions do they ask in the interview for MCA admission in PES University?  
I looked around and found they ask like basics of DSA,OS, computer networks etc etc.

But for DSA do they ask code? or just concepts?Linked List - Implementation in C/C++

⌨️ (1:03:02) Linked List in C/C++ - Inserting a node at beginning

⌨️ (1:15:50) Linked List in C/C++ - Insert a node at nth position  
Thank you.

comments.body: Introduce Yourself,array,jdbc,final year project, explain your project,etc
Very easy just asked dbms Sql and function in programming some time its depend on Teacher i think
